Events that occurred on 15 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1948 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 115.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 147.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing a a letter to W.R. Matthews.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien records verses for the record Poems and Songs of Middle Earth.
2003 - Voice actor Philip Stone dies.
2007 - "Treachery and Deceit", the sixteenth set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, is released.
2014 - Voice actor Casey Kasem dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
